DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response regarding whether the investigator at the facility responsible for receiving editing, processing, analyzing and storing data generated in a study has signed his/her name in confirmation.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A facility that is responsible for receiving, editing, processing, analyzing, and storing data generated in a study and that, in addition, has responsibility for coordination of activities required for execution of the study._A textual or multimedia form of the signed name or personal mark of the investigator who is responsible for completing a particular document as a part of clinical study activity. By signing this document the investigator confirms his participation and his role in the study and assumes responsibility and accountability associated with this role._Having been established or verified.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A facility that is responsible for receiving, editing, processing, analyzing, and storing data generated in a study and that, in addition, has responsibility for coordination of activities required for execution of the study.:A textual or multimedia form of the signed name or personal mark of the investigator who is responsible for completing a particular document as a part of clinical study activity. By signing this document the investigator confirms his participation and his role in the study and assumes responsibility and accountability associated with this role.

Concepts.definition: A facility that is responsible for receiving, editing, processing, analyzing, and storing data generated in a study and that, in addition, has responsibility for coordination of activities required for execution of the study.

A textual or multimedia form of the signed name or personal mark of the investigator who is responsible for completing a particular document as a part of clinical study activity. By signing this document the investigator confirms his participation and his role in the study and assumes responsibility and accountability associated with this role.

Property.preferredDefinition: Confirmed; having been established or verified.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
